questions.question: What does the flex property do in a flex container?
options: Defines the flexibility of a flex item
Sets the direction of flex items
Changes the size of the flex container
questions.correct_answer: Defines the flexibility of a flex item

questions.question: Which CSS property controls the vertical alignment of an element?
questions.correct_answer: vertical-align

questions.question: What does the CSS Grid property 'grid-template-columns' do?
options: Defines the number of columns in a grid layout
Controls the alignment of grid items
Specifies the total width of the grid
questions.correct_answer: Defines the number of columns in a grid layout

questions.question: How do you center an element horizontally in CSS?
questions.correct_answer: margin: auto;

questions.question: Which property is used to control the opacity of an element?
questions.correct_answer: opacity

questions.question: What is the purpose of the CSS property 'overflow'?
options: Specifies what happens when content overflows an element's box
Controls the visibility of an element
Sets the position of an element
Defines the size of an element
questions.correct_answer: Specifies what happens when content overflows an element's box

questions.question: What does the 'position: absolute;' property do?
options: Positions an element relative to its nearest positioned ancestor
Positions an element relative to the viewport
Positions an element relative to its parent
questions.correct_answer: Positions an element relative to its nearest positioned ancestor

questions.question: How do you create a CSS animation?
questions.correct_answer: Using the @keyframes rule

questions.question: Which property is used to change the order of flex items?
questions.correct_answer: order

questions.question: What is the default value of the 'display' property for a <div> element?
questions.correct_answer: block

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create space between elements?
questions.correct_answer: margin

questions.question: What does the 'float' property do?
options: Allows elements to be positioned to the left or right of their container
Controls the visibility of an element
Sets the position of an element
Defines the stacking order of elements
questions.correct_answer: Allows elements to be positioned to the left or right of their container

questions.question: How can you make a list appear horizontally?
questions.correct_answer: All of the above

questions.question: What does the 'calc()' function do in CSS?
options: Performs calculations to set CSS property values
Calculates the width of an element
Defines the height of an element
questions.correct_answer: Performs calculations to set CSS property values

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'transition' property?
options: Defines how property changes should be animated over time
Controls the visibility of an element
Specifies the size of an element
questions.correct_answer: Defines how property changes should be animated over time

questions.question: Which property is used to style a list with images?
questions.correct_answer: list-style-image

questions.question: What does the 'nth-child()' selector do?
options: Selects elements based on their order in a parent
Selects elements based on their type
questions.correct_answer: Selects elements based on their order in a parent

questions.question: What is the use of the 'box-shadow' property?
options: Applies shadow effects around an element's frame
Sets the border of an element
Defines the background color of an element
Controls the visibility of an element
questions.correct_answer: Applies shadow effects around an element's frame

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to set the text shadow?
questions.correct_answer: text-shadow

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'background-size' property?
options: Specifies the size of background images
Sets the size of the container
Defines the width of the background
Controls the alignment of background images
questions.correct_answer: Specifies the size of background images

questions.question: What does the 'pointer-events' property control?
options: Defines how an element reacts to mouse events
Controls the visibility of an element
Specifies the size of an element
questions.correct_answer: Defines how an element reacts to mouse events

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to set the font variant?
questions.correct_answer: font-variant

questions.question: What does the 'align-items' property do in a flex container?
options: Aligns flex items along the cross axis
Aligns flex items along the main axis
Sets the direction of flex items
Defines the spacing between flex items
questions.correct_answer: Aligns flex items along the cross axis

questions.question: Which property is used to create a 3D transformation effect?
questions.correct_answer: transform

questions.question: What does the 'white-space' property do?
options: Controls how whitespace is handled within an element
Sets the visibility of an element
questions.correct_answer: Controls how whitespace is handled within an element

questions.question: Which property is used to create a responsive image in CSS?
questions.correct_answer: max-width

questions.question: What does the 'grid-template-rows' property do?
options: Defines the number of rows in a grid layout
Controls the alignment of grid items
Specifies the total height of the grid
questions.correct_answer: Defines the number of rows in a grid layout

questions.question: How do you make a flex container wrap its items?
questions.correct_answer: flex-wrap: wrap;

questions.question: Which property is used to specify the space between columns in a grid layout?
questions.correct_answer: column-gap

questions.question: What does the 'object-fit' property do?
options: Defines how an element's content should be resized to fit its box
Sets the size of an object
Defines the border of an object
questions.correct_answer: Defines how an element's content should be resized to fit its box
